name: Fenix HM50R Headlamp
description: Small weight, small size, big brightness. Smaller and lighter than most headlamps, yet even brighter, the HM50R is a worth a look. With 4 modes that take you from 4 lumens to 500, you get a light that works around camp, on pre-dawn trail runs or in dark Northern Thailand caves. USB charging makes it easy to top up the included 16340 battery. It's also compatible with CR123 batteries for better cold-weather performance.Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection.Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating.Covered micro-USB port makes charging easy.LED power indicator lets you know how your battery is doing, whether charging or discharging.1-button operation is easy to use, with or without gloves.Intelligent circuitry remembers the last mode you were in.Can be easily adapted into a compact flashlight.Silicone strip on the back of the head strap helps keep it in place.Reflective detailing on the head strap helps keep you visible.Compact design: 6.8 x 3.3 x 2.8cm.In the box: Fenix HM50R, spare O-ring, spare rubber anti-dust cover, spare silicone holder, ARB-L16-700 lithium-ion battery, charging cable, user manual and warranty card.
